title: [LFP] Currently B3 looking for duo buddys
body:
Mains: Jungle, Top & Support

I'm looking for someone (or a few peeps) to climb with, I would prefer to be on Skype/Teamspeak as well.

I prefer to play jungle but I can play top and support. I cannot play ADC or MID I am complete trash at them (I get tilted easily playing those two roles because i feel useless).

I would also prefer to play of a day time as I sleep early at night.

Feel free to add me.

replies.body:
I will add you when i can log back in again 
im b2 and can play mid and adc and the odd top here and there
